'''''The Lord of the Rings Online: Mines of Moria''''' is the soundtrack to ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Mines of Moria]]''. The soundtrack was released as part of the special edition to the game.

#Runes of Fire (Stephen DiGregorio)
#We Cannot Get Out (Stephen DiGregorio)
#The Black Pit (Stephen DiGregorio)
#Flame of Udûn (Chance Thomas)
#The Shadow Lies Upon His Tomb (Stephen DiGregorio)
#Hour of Doom (Chance Thomas)

==Reviews==
The sound track to Mines of Moria has received positive reviews. ''Original Sound Version'' stated that this soundtrack "is superior to the film score."<ref>{{webcite|author=Patrick Gann|articleurl=http://www.originalsoundversion.com/digging-for-musical-gems-mines-of-moria-music-review/|articlename=Digging For Musical Gems: Mines of Moria Music (Review)|dated=14 January 2009|website=Engadget|accessed=25 August 2020}}</ref>
